title: Brussels Sprout Leaves And Crunchy Garden Radishes
summary: Need a gluten free, primal, and vegetarian side dish? Brussels Sprout Leaves And Crunchy Garden Radishes could be a spectacular recipe to try. One serving contains 91 calories, 3g of protein, and 6g of fat. This recipe serves 6. For 78 cents per serving, this recipe covers 13% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. 1 person has made this recipe and would make it again. Head to the store and pick up almond oil, coarse salt and pepper, garlic, and a few other things to make it today. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes about 45 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 49%. This score is solid. Similar recipes include Rib Eye Roast with Chestnuts and Brussels Sprout Leaves, Brussels Sprout Leaves with Chorizo and Toasted Almonds, and Pomegranate-glazed Quail With Frisee & Brussels Sprout Leaves.
